title: Past Trends Suggest ETH Could Rally in February Despite January Slump
body: Despite ETH’s tough start to the year, historical data points to bullish trends in February and March. Innovations in Ethereum's layer 2 ecosystem, like ”based” and ”native” rollups, could enhance decentralization and network unity, while Paradigm is advocating for faster protocol upgrades to address market demands. Meanwhile, Bitcoin dipped below $100,000 due to market turbulence driven by competition in the AI sector and Federal Reserve uncertainty. Ethereum's January Decline Sets Stage for Bullish February Ethereum (ETH) experienced a sharp decline in January by dropping close to 7% and diverging from the broader cryptocurrency market, including Bitcoin. ETH started the year at a high of $3,400 but since fell to $3,049, according to CoinMarketCap. Ethereum’s price action over the past month (Source: CoinMarketCap ) Despite this lackluster start to the year, historical data offers a more bullish outlook for Ethereum in the coming months. February and March have traditionally been very strong periods for the altcoin. CoinGlass data reveals that ETH has only experienced one February decline in its history, back in 2018, after a 50% surge in January. Over the past six consecutive years, ETH posted gains in February, with its largest increase occurring in 2024 when it climbed 46% from $2,280 to $3,380. Similarly, March saw gains in seven of the past nine years. Market sentiment among Ethereum supporters is also still quite optimistic despite the current price drop. Engineer and analyst “ Wolf ” recently shared their confidence in Ethereum’s long-term potential, and described it as the ”best asymmetrical bet” due to the strength of its historical chart performance. Ethereum educator Anthony Sassano also commented positively on recent changes in the Ethereum Foundation, and believes there will be a renewed sense of determination in the community. While January has been challenging for Ethereum, analysts believe the cryptocurrency is well-positioned to benefit from historically bullish trends in February and March. Based Rollups Could Transform Ethereum's Future Executives from leading Ethereum layer 2 networks, including Base, Optimism, and Arbitrum, are willing to improve Ethereum’s network unity by adopting “based” and “native” rollups. These innovations could boost security and reduce fragmentation across the ecosystem. Jesse Pollak, head of Base, pointed out the potential of based rollups during a Jan. 25 call with Ethereum founders and developers. He believes they can play an important role in creating a stronger connection to Ethereum while improving security guarantees. Optimism Foundation Director Ben Jones also voiced his support. Call with Ethereum founders and devs (Source: YouTube ) Based rollups were introduced by Ethereum core developer Justin Drake in 2023, and they shift the block-building process back to Ethereum’s base layer, decentralizing it by involving all Ethereum validators rather than relying on a single centralized sequencer. This change addresses concerns over centralization in existing layer 2 networks, which generated huge revenue through centralized sequencers. Although this transition could reduce layer 2 profits from Maximum Extractable Value, it will reallocate revenue to Ethereum’s base layer, which could potentially benefit ETH’s price. Native rollups are another proposed improvement, which would enhance transaction execution at the base layer, fostering better network composability. Despite the benefits, decentralized sequencing would extend transaction confirmation times to 12 seconds compared to the near-instant confirmations currently offered by layer 2 networks. Several executives also support adopting “FABRIC,” which is an infrastructure standard that is designed to facilitate based rollups. Taiko’s CEO Daniel Wang confirmed that his firm is ready to implement FABRIC to address interoperability issues. Taiko was the first layer 2 to adopt based rollups. Overall, Ethereum layer 2s are more than ready to enhance the network’s decentralization, composability, and unity, even at the expense of short-term revenue advantages. Paradigm Pushes for Faster Ethereum Protocol Upgrades Paradigm, a crypto venture capital firm, called for faster implementation of protocol changes in Ethereum to adapt to evolving market structures while still preserving the network’s core values. In a blog post that was published on Jan. 25, Paradigm argued that Ethereum’s development pace, historically averaging one major change per year, could accelerate without compromising its principles of decentralization, openness, and neutrality. The firm believes that Ethereum’s resources, including its talented researchers and engineers, are more than sufficient to support quicker and parallel development to solve problems efficiently and avoid unnecessary delays. Paradigm also pointed out the importance of prioritizing high-impact improvements, like allowing Ethereum layer 2 networks to inherit security directly from the base layer through native rollups. This aligns with the recent support from layer 2 executives, who are willing to adopt these solutions to improve security and reduce fragmentation. The firm also believes there is a need to scale Ethereum’s mainnet without modifying the block gas limit and called for improvements in wallet infrastructure to simplify user experiences, including eliminating the reliance on private keys. The venture capital firm also mentioned that client diversity should not hinder the pace of innovation and announced the development of the Reth Ethereum testnet to provide developers with an experimental platform for new ideas. Paradigm considers these protocol changes crucial to driving blockchain innovation and achieving Ethereum’s ambitious roadmap. The Ethereum Foundation itself recently committed resources to the ecosystem by allocating 50,000 ETH, which is valued at close to $160 million, to support the decentralized finance (DeFi) space. This happened after an announcement by Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin that the nonprofit organization will undergo structural changes to provide more active support for developers and increase transparency in the community. Bitcoin Dips Below $100K Despite outperforming Ethereum throughout January so far, Bitcoin fell below $100,000 for the first time since President Donald Trump’s inauguration on Jan. 20. This was likely due to market turbulence driven by competition in the artificial intelligence (AI) sector and shifting monetary policy expectations. Bitcoin’s price action over the past 24 hours (Source: CoinMarketCap ) Analysts largely attributed the decline in BTC’s price to the rapid rise of China-based AI app DeepSeek, which recently overtook ChatGPT to claim the top spot on Apple’s App Store rankings in the US. As a result, this caused fears of an escalating AI arms race. The success of DeepSeek sent shockwaves through various sectors, including technology and cryptocurrency. Nvidia , which is also a dominant player in the AI space, saw its valuation dip by 3.12% to $3.49 trillion by Jan. 24. In the crypto market, approximately $864 million in positions were liquidated, with Bitcoin long positions contributing $250 million, according to CoinGlass data . Market sentiment was dampened even more by expectations of a hawkish tone from the US Federal Reserve. With no rate cuts expected at its upcoming meeting on Jan. 28 and 29, traders have scrambled for downside protection. Analysts suggest the market is likely to remain range-bound until fresh policy signals emerge. Overall, the COO of Bitget Alvin Kan shared that investor caution intensified due to volatility in the US AI market and broader economic uncertainties. Despite the negative sentiment, Matrixport analysts presented a more bullish outlook due to the Chinese New Year and Lunar New Year celebrations across Asia, which are historically favorable times for Bitcoin. This festive season is known to create a statistically strong 20-day window for the cryptocurrency, which certainly could provide some hope for a potential rebound despite the current market challenges.

title: Singularity Finance partners with Particle Network
body: Singularity Finance, the first AI-centric EVM-compatible Layer 2 blockchain, announces collaboration with Particle Network, a prominent Chain Abstraction infrastructure provider, as shared with Finbold on Monday, January 27. With this collaboration, Singularity Finance’s ecosystem will significantly benefit from Particle Network’s Universal Accounts through Chain Abstraction. The joint effort will allow users to connect to artificial intelligence , real-world assets (RWAs), and decentralized finance ( DeFi ). Joining funds also means that this effort will be able to address crucial obstacles in blockchain adoption, such as expanding accessibility and unblocking interoperability across both networks. Incorporating Universal Accounts in the SFI ecosystem allows users to seamlessly apply any DApps on the SFI chain using tokens available on other chains. In effect, this will provide users with more efficient tools, better collaboration opportunities, and a simpler way to engage with the changing AI environment. Collaboration approval Cloris Chen, CEO of Singularity Finance, commended the joint effort: “Our collaboration with Particle Network reflects our commitment to building a robust and inclusive ecosystem for the AI economy. Together, we aim to accelerate progress and open new avenues for growth by integrating infrastructure solutions that simplify blockchain interactions and enhance the user experience.” Likewise, a spokesperson from Particle Network added: “Collaborating with Singularity Finance represents a unique opportunity to bring Chain Abstraction to an ecosystem that is shaping the future of AI and blockchain integration. We look forward to a productive collaboration through impactful product integration.” This cooperation has a basis in a common commitment to creating workable solutions that make decentralized technology better, more relevant, and closer to mass adoption. The post Singularity Finance partners with Particle Network appeared first on Finbold .

title: Bridging the Gap: How Blockchain Can Unlock Global Financial Inclusion
body: Over 1.4 billion adults lack access to financial services worldwide, depriving them of opportunities to invest, save, and even pay bills in some cases. These numbers represent individuals navigating life without the financial safety nets most depend on. Blockchain and Web3 technologies are creating pathways to bridge the gap between financial systems and unbanked or underbanked customers. Challenges in Accessing Traditional Banking Systems For many, gaining access to conventional banks is simply not feasible, even in nations like the US, where such issues might not be expected. Nearly 23% of those earning less than $25,000 annually are disconnected from financial services. Barriers are widespread globally, influenced by geographical, economic, and social factors. The need for extensive paperwork, high fees, and the requirement to visit physical branches serve as significant hurdles. Maintaining a bank account is often difficult due to minimum balance requirements or monthly fees that lower-income families might struggle to meet. Entire communities are without the necessary tools for financial security and stability. Additionally, the limited operating hours of many banks clash with the schedules of hourly workers, making access difficult or inconvenient. In developing countries or rural areas, unreliable infrastructure, lack of internet access, and distant branches exacerbate the situation, leaving many without essential services. Blockchain Solutions Offering New Opportunities There's immense potential in communities whose financial power remains untapped, with merchants losing out on connections with a large underserved market. Web3 technologies could revolutionize this, offering tools that enable the unbanked and underbanked to engage with financial systems. Blockchain platforms provide decentralized lending and payment options, along with verifiable credit histories. An example is the L1 blockchain Creditcoin , designed to reach the unbanked, focusing on emerging markets. It recently launched the Ecosystem Investment Program via Credit Labs, valued at $10 million. This initiative aims to foster innovation within the platform's network by offering equity investments between $25,000 and $250,000 to Web3 entrepreneurs, startups, businesses, and developers. The program targets projects that advance Web3 tech adoption, enhance financial access, improve decentralized payment and credit solutions, and apply Creditcoin's blockchain in real-world scenarios. Creditcoin also supports decentralized internet access through Spacecoin, delivering high-speed satellite connections to underserved areas. Greater access to credit promotes economic growth, enabling businesses to expand and create job opportunities. Leapfrogging to Advanced Solutions In many developing regions, the jump to mobile technology was due to limited funds for infrastructure. The high costs of upgrading and implementing outdated infrastructure led people to bypass traditional communication methods. This demonstrates that lower-income countries can skip older systems and directly adopt modern technology. For instance, landline use is minimal in countries like India, Ghana, and Nigeria, while mobile phone adoption is rapidly increasing . Blockchain technology, much like mobile tech, can fill the void left by outdated systems. Platforms such as Spectral and Centrifuge utilize this technology to track financial activities, creating transparent credit scores based on blockchain behavior. Decentralized platforms integrate alternative data sources, such as utility payments or mobile phone usage, to determine creditworthiness. DeFi loans, both collateralized and uncollateralized, present intriguing possibilities. The first type requires users to deposit assets exceeding the loan amount to manage default risks. Jellyverse's jAssets allows users to monitor the value of traditional assets, using crypto as collateral. TrueFi offers uncollateralized loans to reliable borrowers based on their credit and reputation. Community lending pools enable groups to support individuals, reducing default risks. Platforms like MakerDAO employ smart contracts to automate loan processes and collateral management. Digital platforms facilitate cross-border lending, making credit accessible to those underserved. Lenders and borrowers interact directly, with funds secured in smart contracts until conditions are fulfilled. Decentralized payment gateways such as Celo focus on smooth cross-border transactions using stablecoins. Web3 companies are also developing user-friendly interfaces for those less tech-savvy, including wallets with fiat on/off ramps for straightforward onboarding. By cutting out intermediaries, Web3 and DeFi platforms can offer lower transaction fees than traditional banks. Advantages for Blockchain Firms in Serving the Unbanked Naturally, Web3 and blockchain companies can benefit from catering to populations in developing nations, primarily through long-term profitability. Emerging economies are expected to grow faster than their developed counterparts, with purchasing power and financial activity rising swiftly. The IMF ranked countries based on projected real GDP growth from 2024 to 2025. Many developing nations, including Libya and Sudan, fall into the highest growth category, with GDP predicted to rise by over 13% and 8%, respectively. Governments in these regions often welcome innovation and may offer favorable regulations or testing environments for blockchain solutions. Blockchain companies entering these markets early can secure a leading position, staying ahead of rivals. Investors, customers, and partners may view companies focusing on developing regions as socially and environmentally responsible. Blockchain technology has significant potential for environmental sustainability, offering secure solutions for renewable energy trading, tracking carbon emissions, protecting natural resources, and managing waste. Many blockchain projects in these areas align with Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) objectives, attracting impact-driven investors. While Bitcoin is known for its environmental impact, a recent study identified 23 blockchain networks with much lower carbon emissions and energy consumption compared to Bitcoin. Notable eco-friendly blockchains include Fantom and Algorand. Numerous organizations and projects support sustainable blockchain efforts, such as GreenTrust, the Renewable Energy Certificate Mechanism, and the Energy Web Foundation. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Jasmy Coin: Price, News, and Predictions for 2025
body: Jasmy Coin has been making waves in the crypto market with its unique approach to data democratization. It focuses on creating a decentralized infrastructure for data storage and sharing. Key Features of Jasmy Coin Data Ownership : Jasmy enables users to regain control of their personal data. IoT Integration : Facilitates secure communication between IoT devices. Ethereum-Based : Built on the Ethereum blockchain for scalability and security. This scenario is highly ambitious and depends on: Mass adoption of Jasmy’s decentralized data solutions. Significant token burns to reduce supply. Strong partnerships and ecosystem growth. title: Bitcoin Sudden Breakdown: Price Falls Below $100,000 Support
body: Bitcoin has encountered a critical breakdown, slipping below the $100,000 support level, a significant milestone that has been pivotal in its recent price rally. This unexpected move raises concerns over the sustainability of its upward momentum, with the market now at a crossroads. It is important to be keenly on the lookout for whether this breach is a temporary dip or a sign of more extensive downside movement in the coming sessions. The breach of the $100,000 support level places Bitcoin at a precarious juncture. Historically, this level has acted as a psychological barrier and a key point of support. The coming days will be crucial in shaping the next phase of Bitcoin’s market performance, with any sustained weakness potentially setting the stage for a deeper correction. Analyzing The Break Below $100,000 Support BTC’s current price action indicates that the asset is firmly in a bearish phase, demonstrating significant negative resilience after successfully dropping below the 4-hour Relative Strength Index (RSI) and the critical $100,000 support level. Related Reading: Bitcoin To $181,000? Mayer Multiple Reveals When BTC Will Become ‘Overbought’ This break below $100,000 represents a pivotal shift in market sentiment, signaling the strength of the bears as they seize control of the price action. Its failure to hold above this important support level has caused a wave of selling pressure, pushing the price lower and raising concerns about further declines in the short term. Compounding the movements, the RSI, which has now dropped into oversold territory, reinforces the bearish outlook, suggesting a lack of buying interest and that the market sentiment remains firmly negative. As Bitcoin struggles to find support at lower levels, traders are closely watching for any signs of stabilization. If the price continues to trade below the $100,000 mark, further downside movement toward key support zones such as $90,000 or even $85,000 could be expected. Moreover, the break of the $100,000 support has now set a new benchmark, and a failure to reclaim this level might indicate that the bears remain in control, triggering downward pressure in the foreseeable future. Will Bitcoin Reclaim $100,000 Or Continue To Slide? Bitcoin’s recent price action has left traders wondering whether the cryptocurrency can reclaim the critical $100,000 support level or if it will continue its slide. After breaking below this key level, the asset is currently facing increased bearish pressure, with market sentiment shifting to the downside. Failure to bounce back above $100,000 may signal a deeper downturn, pushing Bitcoin toward lower support zones such as $93,257. Related Reading: Crypto Experts Forecast Bitcoin Market Peak: Bear Market Could Emerge Within 3 Months However, if BTC reverses the current trend and reclaims the $100,000 level, it could set the stage for a potential recovery. A strong rally above this threshold would likely reinvigorate bullish sentiment and provide fresh momentum for further upside toward its current all-time high of $109,577. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Funding Rates Turn Negative in Bitcoin Due to China's DeepSeek Effect! What Does It Mean? Here Are the Details
body: Bitcoin (BTC) funding rates turned negative amid a sharp sell-off in Wall Street's tech-heavy Nasdaq futures, falling 700 points in pre-market trading. Bitcoin Funding Rates Turn Negative as Nasdaq Futures Drop 700 Points The decline follows growing concerns that China's artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek could challenge U.S. dominance in the sector and trigger a broader sense of risk aversion. According to Velo Data, BTC’s perpetual futures funding rate has turned negative, indicating that traders are either more bullish or bearish. This suggests that more investors are betting on further price declines by taking short positions. The leading cryptocurrency fell more than 3%, briefly dropping below $98,000. Meanwhile, Nasdaq futures fell 3.5%, while AI giant NVIDIA lost 10% in pre-market trading. The sell-off came shortly after President Donald Trump signaled support for a crypto policy working group but stopped short of approving a U.S. Bitcoin reserve, dampening market optimism. Simultaneously, the emergence of DeepSeek has shaken up the tech industry, as its success demonstrates that low-cost AI models can disrupt incumbent US-based companies. Despite the bearish trend, negative funding rates have historically signaled local price bottoms in BTC. There is also the risk of a short squeeze, where bears closing positions could push prices back up. However, analysts warn that the funding rate swing remains narrow and it is too early to call short BTC an overcrowded trade. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Funding Rates Turn Negative in Bitcoin Due to China's DeepSeek Effect! What Does It Mean? Here Are the Details

title: XRP News Today: Ripple’s New Payment Solutions Could Drive XRP to $9
body: The post XRP News Today: Ripple’s New Payment Solutions Could Drive XRP to $9 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ripple continues to dominate crypto headlines, with its On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) solution allowing banks to transfer funds more quickly and at a lower cost than ever before. Some believe that, with the rising demand for seamless and efficient cross-border payments, XRP might have a chance of reaching $9 in the near future. There’s also NovaDEX ($NVX) , a new project that could gain momentum as a decentralized exchange with exciting features like staking pools offering solid rewards and yield farming opportunities. The project’s mainnet went live just and has already hit some impressive milestones, showing that it might be one to watch. Let’s break down the details of both projects. Can Ripple (XRP) Reach $9 with Its Latest Payment Solution? Ripple (XRP) appears to be building momentum, fueled by its recent legal win against the SEC, which has sparked fresh confidence across the crypto market. This positive regulatory outcome has shifted perceptions, with more institutional players now seeing Ripple as a credible force in the blockchain space. Ripple’s position in cross-border payments remains strong, bolstered by the integration of RLUSD. This solution is gaining recognition as a reliable option for global transactions, potentially enhancing Ripple’s ecosystem and XRP’s use cases. Whale investors seem to be taking notice of these developments, with data pointing to an uptick in large-scale XRP accumulation. Historically, whale activity tends to impact price trends, increasing liquidity and boosting market sentiment. On the technical front, XRP is showing promising signs. TradingView data highlights steady increases in trading volume, which could signal a breakout on the horizon. Analysts are watching closely for further upward momentum. Broader market trends also align with Ripple’s strengths. As crypto adoption grows and demand for efficient cross-border payment solutions rises, Ripple’s offerings stand out compared to other technologies. With its expanding partnerships, increasing whale interest, and favorable market dynamics, XRP could be on track to hit $9 by the end of Q1 2025—assuming the current trends hold steady. Ripple’s innovations and strategic moves position it as a strong contender for significant gains in the next market cycle. What Is NovaDEX All About? NovaDEX is a decentralized exchange (DEX) that offers users access to concentrated liquidity, yield farming, and staking pools. The platform’s mainnet launched recently, achieving significant milestones that point to strong adoption potential in the DeFi space. According to the official website, the native token NVX plays a critical role in the ecosystem. Over 1,900 holders currently back the token. Other Solana DeFi Projects like Jupter, Orca or Raydium have achieved significant traction within the Solana ecosystem. Whether NovaDEX can achieve something similar remains to be seen. Expectations for further growth remain high as more users discover the platform’s features. Since its introduction, NovaDEX has gained attention as one of the most active and fast-growing projects in DeFi. The platform already handled over 85,000 transactions across various activities, highlighting its momentum and appeal in the decentralized finance market. What Gives NovaDEX Its Edge? Innovation, Growth, and Security So, how is NovaDEX any different from hundreds of other DeFi platforms? Well, the main differentiating feature is its ability to let users create permissionless liquidity pools for any coin on the exchange. This freedom could allow traders to explore opportunities not typically available on other platforms. The platform also delivers competitive pricing and high returns. With low slippage and some of the best APRs in the market, it offers strong incentives for investors. Yield farming adds another layer of value by allowing users to earn rewards through liquidity provider tokens in yield farm pools, creating opportunities for consistent income. The exchange also emphasizes decentralization and security. Users play a direct role in its development through a community-driven governance model. On the security front, NovaDEX’s smart contracts have undergone audits by QuillAudits, ensuring the platform provides a safe environment for its users. With its focus on innovation, user control, and security, NovaDEX could become a truly unique and valuable player in the DeFi space. Wrapping Up Whether XRP reaches $9 will likely depend on continued regulatory support and greater adoption, especially with Trump’s push for deregulation. Market dynamics, combined with further favorable rulings for Ripple, could heavily influence XRP’s future trajectory. Meanwhile, NovaDEX could bring something fresh to the Solana ecosystem. With its advanced features, including permissionless liquidity pools, yield farming and staking, NovaDEX has the potential to reshape decentralized finance on Solana. ————– This article is not financial advice. title: Analysts Point to Critical Level in Bitcoin! Below This Level Gives Strength to Bears! Here Are the Details
body: Bitcoin’s (BTC) historic bull run is being tested as the leading cryptocurrency has dropped below $98,000, a drop of nearly 10% from its all-time high of $109,000. Van Straten Says Bitcoin's Bull Run Will Face Major Test If BTC Drops Below $91K Analysts warn that any further declines below $91,000 could put significant pressure on the rally. The latest pullback has been attributed to concerns over China's DeepSeek AI, whose hyper-efficient AI model is seen as a major challenge to the US's tech dominance. That, along with a broader sell-off in U.S. markets, contributed to heightened risk aversion. Nasdaq futures fell 4%, signaling a broader correction in stocks. On the other hand, Bitcoin’s bull run has suffered multiple 15% corrections since Donald Trump won the US elections. BTC has experienced double-digit declines several times since its rise from $66,000 to $109,000, making the current decline appear consistent with previous market behavior. A key support level to watch is the short-term owner cost floor, currently at $91,000. This metric, which tracks the average on-chain cost of coins moved over the last 155 days, has historically served as a floor in bullish markets. However, the bearish sentiment is growing. The negative Bitcoin funding rate is suggesting that traders are betting on further downside. Meanwhile, BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes predicted a correction to $70,000-$75,000 before BTC eventually climbs to $250,000. With both crypto and equity markets under pressure, investors are closely watching whether Bitcoin can hold above $91,000 or if a deeper correction is on the horizon. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Analysts Point to Critical Level in Bitcoin! Below This Level Gives Strength to Bears! Here Are the Details

title: Ethereum Foundation Sold Ethereum Once Again! Here is the Amount of ETH Sold!
body: According to Onchain Lens, the Ethereum Foundation has once again liquidated 100 ETH, selling it for 307,893 DAI at an average price of $3,078.93. Ethereum Foundation Sells 100 More ETH, Bringing Total ETH Sold to 300 in 2025 This is the third sale this year, bringing the foundation's total ETH sale in 2025 to 300 ETH. Ethereum Foundation's ETH Sales Strategy The Ethereum Foundation has historically sold ETH at market highs, leading to speculation about its potential impact on market sentiment and Ethereum’s price trends. However, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has previously suggested exploring staking and DeFi yields as alternative sources of income rather than selling ETH holdings. While the foundation’s ETH sales have raised questions in the community, these sales may reflect operational funding needs rather than a bearish outlook. The market will watch whether the Ethereum Foundation continues this trend or moves to alternative income strategies as Vitalik has previously hinted. As the downward trend continues in the cryptocurrency market, Ethereum (ETH) was trading at $3050 at the time of writing. *This is not investment advice. title: Gold Coins: A Timeless Investment for Wealth Preservation
body: Gold coins have been a symbol of wealth, prestige, and stability for centuries. In uncertain economic times, gold remains a trusted asset for investors looking to diversify their portfolios and protect their wealth. Whether you’re a seasoned investor or a first-time buyer, understanding the nuances of gold coin investments is crucial. This article delves into gold coins , their types, prices, and why they continue to be a popular investment choice. What Are Gold Coins? Gold coins are physical coins made of gold, often minted by governments or private entities. Unlike gold bars, coins are smaller in size, easier to handle, and often come with historical or collectible value. Key Features of Gold Coins Purity : Gold coins are typically minted in purities of 22K (91.67%) or 24K (99.99%). Weight : Common weights range from 1 gram to 1 ounce. Minting Authority : Coins may feature designs from government mints or private entities. Legal Tender : Many gold coins have a nominal face value, although their market value is based on gold content. Why Invest in Gold Coins? Hedge Against Inflation Gold maintains its value over time, making it a reliable hedge against inflation. Wealth Preservation Gold coins are tangible assets, offering security during economic downturns or financial crises. Liquidity Easily bought and sold globally, gold coins are one of the most liquid investment options. Portfolio Diversification Adding gold coins to your portfolio reduces overall risk and enhances stability. Collectible Value Certain gold coins, especially rare or historic ones, can appreciate significantly due to their numismatic value. Types of Gold Coins 1. Bullion Coins Minted primarily for investment purposes, bullion coins are valued based on their gold content. Examples : American Gold Eagle Canadian Gold Maple Leaf South African Krugerrand 2. Commemorative Coins Issued to celebrate significant events, these coins often carry additional collectible value. 3. Numismatic Coins Rare or antique gold coins prized for their historical significance, craftsmanship, and rarity. Examples : Saint-Gaudens Double Eagle British Sovereign 4. Regional Gold Coins Popular in specific regions, these coins often reflect cultural or traditional designs. Examples : Indian Gold Sovereign Chinese Panda Coin Gold Coin Prices and Factors Influencing Them Current Gold Coin Prices 1-Gram Gold Coin : $60–$70 (approx). 1-Ounce Gold Coin : $1,900–$2,100 (approx). Factors Affecting Gold Coin Prices Spot Gold Price The global price of gold directly impacts coin values. Purity Higher purity coins command higher prices. Collectibility Rare or historic coins can sell for significantly more than their gold content. Market Demand Rising demand during economic uncertainty can drive up prices. Mint Premiums Coins from reputable mints often carry additional premiums. How to Buy Gold Coins Choose a Reputable Dealer Look for certified dealers with a track record of authenticity and reliability. Decide on the Type of Coin Determine whether you want bullion for investment or numismatic coins for collection. Check Purity and Weight Verify the coin’s purity (22K or 24K) and weight before purchasing. Compare Prices Compare prices across multiple dealers to get the best deal. Request Certification Ensure the coin comes with a certificate of authenticity and purchase receipt. Gold Coins vs. Gold Bars Feature Gold Coins Gold Bars Size Smaller, available in various weights. Larger, often heavier (1 kg or more). Liquidity Easier to sell in smaller denominations. Higher value, harder to liquidate partially. Collectible Value May have numismatic or commemorative value. Primarily for investment purposes. Storage Compact and easy to store. Requires secure storage facilities. Tips for Investing in Gold Coins Start Small Begin with smaller denominations to minimize risk. Avoid Overpaying Be wary of coins with high premiums unless they have significant collectible value. Diversify Your Holdings Combine gold coins with other assets like stocks or bonds for a balanced portfolio. Check Market Trends Monitor gold price trends and market news before buying or selling. Secure Your Investment Store your coins in a secure location like a safety deposit box or home safe. Conclusion Gold coins remain a timeless investment, offering a unique combination of wealth preservation, liquidity, and collectible value. Whether you’re purchasing bullion coins for their gold content or numismatic coins for their rarity, gold coins are an excellent addition to any investment portfolio. With the right research and a trusted dealer, you can confidently invest in gold coins and enjoy the financial stability they provide. To learn more about innovative investment opportunities, explore our article on the latest trends in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology, where we uncover groundbreaking ventures disrupting traditional industries. FAQs What are gold coins? Gold coins are physical coins made of gold, often minted by governments or private entities for investment or collectible purposes. Are gold coins a good investment? Yes, gold coins are a reliable investment for wealth preservation, hedging against inflation, and portfolio diversification. How do I buy gold coins? Purchase gold coins from certified dealers, check their purity and weight, and request certification for authenticity. What is the difference between gold coins and gold bars? Gold coins are smaller, more liquid, and may have collectible value, while gold bars are primarily for large-scale investments. What factors influence gold coin prices? Gold coin prices are influenced by the spot gold price, purity, collectibility, demand, and mint premiums. title: Worldcoin Rival Humanity Protocol's Valuation Jumps to $1.1B After Fresh Fund Raise
body: Decentralized identity project Humanity Protocol has closed a $20 million funding round, raising its valuation to $1.1 billion. The funding round was co-led by Pantera Capital and Jump Crypto, according to an emailed announcement. The project last raised $30 million at a $1 billion valuation in May 2024 Humanity plans to use the new capital to accelerate the development of its Proof of Humanity consensus mechanism and integrate it into leading Web3 platforms. The protocol, which uses palm scans to verify identity, aims to rival OpenAI founder Sam Altman's Worldcoin project, which is built around scanning users' irises . Read More: Lido Co-Founders Said to Plot Competitor to Sam Altman's World Network

title: How Long Will the Decline in Bitcoin (BTC) Continue? What Levels Can Be Seen? Experienced Analysts Explained!
body: Despite the open support of US President Donald Trump, Bitcoin suffered a major decline and fell to $98,900 levels. The decline in Bitcoin coincided with a downturn in the broader cryptocurrency market triggered by the launch of DeepSeek R1, which shook the AI sector and negatively impacted the prices of AI-themed tokens. While investors are nervous about the decline experienced before the FOMC, they are wondering how long the decline in BTC can last. At this point, pseudonymous analyst AlphaBTC said in his X analysis that Bitcoin looks weak. Stating that breaking the $100,000 support could cause Bitcoin’s price to drop below $90,000, the analyst argued that if the bulls regain $100,000, the price could recover from current levels. “BTC and TradFi futures have been selling off all night, Bitcoin is looking really weak as we start a new week. This time, it seems that the 100,000 level has been passed, but the question will be: will BTC be able to regain this level with a strong reaction or will we fall below 90,000 once again? Apart from this, popular analyst Michael van de Poppe also shared his current analysis. Warning his followers not to panic, the analyst claimed that the ongoing selling wave was “nothing more than a short-term panic reaction in the markets.” According to Poppe, who stated that the decline presents a buying opportunity, the range between $99,000 and $98,000 offers a suitable entry zone for Bitcoin investors. The analyst also warned that if the bulls fail to seize power, the Bitcoin price could drop to $89,500-$91,500. Bitcoin Price Could Drop to $70,000! BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes said in a tweet that Bitcoin could potentially pull back to the $70,000 to $75,000 range, and that this move could trigger a mini financial crisis. However, Hayes added that the BTC price could rise to $250,000 by the end of the year. Related News: BitMEX Former CEO Arthur Hayes Warned! "Bitcoin Could Fall to These Levels Before Resuming Its Rise!" *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: How Long Will the Decline in Bitcoin (BTC) Continue? What Levels Can Be Seen? Experienced Analysts Explained!

title: MicroStrategy’s Unrealized BTC Revenue Reaches 65%, Valued at $190 Billion
body: MicroStrategy (Nasdaq: MSTR), widely recognized as the corporate entity holding the largest amount of Bitcoin globally, has achieved an unrealized BTC revenue of 65% , translating to an astounding valuation of approximately $190 billion. This milestone highlights MicroStrategy’s enduring confidence in Bitcoin as a long-term asset. According to Cointellig , the company’s strategic decisions in expanding its Bitcoin holdings have proven to be monumental in the cryptocurrency sector. Over the last 22 days, MicroStrategy has taken proactive measures to bolster its Bitcoin reserves. A significant move by the company’s shareholders recently approved the expansion of its stock issuance limit, paving the way for additional Bitcoin acquisitions. This decision not only cements the company’s role as a key player in the cryptocurrency landscape but also underscores its commitment to maximizing returns through Bitcoin investments. MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin Journey: A Pioneer in Institutional BTC Adoption MicroStrategy has been at the forefront of institutional Bitcoin adoption since its initial purchase in 2020. Led by Executive Chairman Michael Saylor, the company’s investment strategy is centered around the belief that Bitcoin is “digital gold.” By accumulating Bitcoin during market fluctuations, MicroStrategy has consistently capitalized on its belief in the cryptocurrency’s potential for long-term growth. The company’s unwavering strategy has made it the largest Bitcoin holder among publicly traded companies, solidifying its reputation as a trailblazer in the cryptocurrency space. As of today, MicroStrategy holds over 152,000 BTC , purchased at an aggregate cost of approximately $4.53 billion. Shareholders Back Strategic Expansion for BTC Acquisitions The shareholders’ recent approval to expand stock issuance limits demonstrates confidence in MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin-centric investment approach. By increasing the availability of funds for acquiring Bitcoin, MicroStrategy continues to scale its operations while strengthening its position as a leader in Bitcoin adoption. This decision aligns with the broader trend of institutional investors embracing Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and economic uncertainty. The move also signals the company’s long-term vision of leveraging Bitcoin’s potential to generate exponential returns. The fact that MicroStrategy’s unrealized BTC revenue has reached 65% is a testament to the profitability of its Bitcoin investment strategy, even amidst the cryptocurrency market’s inherent volatility. The $190 Billion Achievement: What It Means for the Industry With its unrealized Bitcoin revenue hitting 65%, MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin holdings are now valued at approximately $190 billion. This remarkable figure not only reflects the success of MicroStrategy’s investment strategy but also serves as a benchmark for other institutional investors considering Bitcoin as a viable asset. This development is particularly significant given Bitcoin’s recent recovery from bear market conditions. As market conditions improve, MicroStrategy’s valuation may continue to rise, further validating its strategic decisions. Moreover, the company’s consistent investment in Bitcoin reinforces its status as a key influencer in driving institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies. The Role of Bitcoin in Modern Investment Portfolios MicroStrategy’s bullish stance on Bitcoin has prompted a broader discussion about the role of cryptocurrencies in modern investment portfolios. As inflationary pressures mount and fiat currencies face devaluation, Bitcoin’s scarcity and decentralized nature make it an appealing store of value. Institutional investors like MicroStrategy have increasingly turned to Bitcoin to diversify their holdings and protect against traditional market risks. This trend underscores the growing recognition of Bitcoin as a legitimate financial instrument with the potential to reshape the global economy. The Future of MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin Strategy Looking ahead, MicroStrategy shows no signs of slowing down its Bitcoin acquisitions. The company has repeatedly emphasized its commitment to holding Bitcoin as a long-term asset, regardless of market volatility. The recent shareholder decision to expand the stock issuance limit indicates that MicroStrategy remains steadfast in its efforts to increase its Bitcoin holdings. This move could encourage other companies to follow suit, further accelerating institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies. As Bitcoin’s value continues to stabilize and regulatory frameworks evolve, MicroStrategy is well-positioned to reap the rewards of its bold investment strategy. The company’s unwavering belief in Bitcoin as a transformative asset could inspire more corporations to integrate cryptocurrencies into their financial strategies. Impact on the Cryptocurrency Ecosystem MicroStrategy’s achievements are not just milestones for the company but also for the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem. By demonstrating the profitability of institutional Bitcoin investments, MicroStrategy paves the way for increased corporate adoption of cryptocurrencies. The company’s success also reinforces the argument that Bitcoin can serve as a hedge against economic uncertainties. As more companies and investors embrace Bitcoin, the cryptocurrency market is likely to witness greater stability and maturity, attracting further investment and innovation. FAQs What is MicroStrategy’s unrealized BTC revenue? MicroStrategy’s unrealized BTC revenue refers to the profit generated from its Bitcoin holdings that has not yet been realized through selling. As of now, the company’s unrealized BTC revenue stands at 65%, valued at approximately $190 billion. How much Bitcoin does MicroStrategy hold? MicroStrategy holds over 152,000 Bitcoin, purchased at an aggregate cost of approximately $4.53 billion. This makes it the largest corporate Bitcoin holder globally. What is the significance of the 65% unrealized BTC revenue? The 65% unrealized BTC revenue highlights the profitability of MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin investment strategy, serving as a benchmark for institutional investors considering Bitcoin as an asset. Why did MicroStrategy expand its stock issuance limit? MicroStrategy expanded its stock issuance limit to raise additional funds for Bitcoin acquisitions. This move reflects the company’s confidence in Bitcoin’s potential for long-term growth. What impact does MicroStrategy have on the cryptocurrency industry? MicroStrategy’s success in Bitcoin investments has encouraged other institutional investors to adopt Bitcoin. The company’s achievements have positioned it as a key influencer in driving corporate adoption of cryptocurrencies. What does the future hold for MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin strategy? MicroStrategy plans to continue accumulating Bitcoin as a long-term asset. The company’s consistent investments and shareholder support indicate a strong commitment to maximizing returns through Bitcoin holdings. Conclusion MicroStrategy’s unrealized BTC revenue reaching 65% and its valuation of $190 billion underscore the company’s pioneering role in institutional Bitcoin adoption. By consistently investing in Bitcoin and expanding its stock issuance limit, MicroStrategy demonstrates unwavering confidence in Bitcoin’s potential as a transformative asset. As the cryptocurrency industry matures, MicroStrategy’s bold approach serves as a roadmap for other companies looking to embrace digital assets. With its strategic foresight and commitment to innovation, MicroStrategy continues to shape the future of cryptocurrency adoption on a global scale. title: Bybit Introduces Blockchain-Powered Payment Solution in Brazil with PIX Compatibility
body: Dubai, United Arab Emirates, January 27th, 2025, Chainwire Bybit , the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, has launched Bybit Pay in Brazil, introducing a cutting-edge payment solution that integrates seamlessly with PIX, the country’s leading instant payment system. The launch underscores Bybit’s commitment to bridging Web2 and Web3 payments and providing a streamlined way for users to transact in both fiat and cryptocurrency. Wherever there is PIX, Bybit Pay can be used. Bybit Pay: Redefining Digital Transactions Bybit Pay allows users to connect their crypto wallets to a variety of financial possibilities, supporting both fiat and cryptocurrency. The platform simplifies transactions across websites, mobile applications, and point-of-sale (POS) systems, offering an intuitive interface for deposits, withdrawals, and payments. Its launch in Brazil aligns with the country’s growing adoption of digital finance technologies. Joan Han, Sales and Marketing Director at Bybit, highlighted the significance of the launch: “Bybit Pay is designed to bridge traditional and digital payments effortlessly. Brazil’s forward-thinking adoption of digital finance makes it the ideal market for this launch. By leveraging PIX QR codes and multi-currency support, Bybit Pay offers a seamless, secure, and flexible solution tailored to the evolving needs of our users.” Currently, Bybit Pay is available to verified users in Brazil through the Bybit app and website. The platform supports payments in Brazilian reais (BRL) and leading cryptocurrencies, including USDT, USDC, BTC, and ETH. Key Features and Benefits of Bybit Pay PIX QR Code Compatibility Bybit Pay integrates with PIX, allowing users to scan QR codes to complete payments in fiat or cryptocurrency. This functionality offers a convenient and familiar experience for Brazilian users. Integrated Wallet Management The platform combines crypto and fiat wallet functionality, enabling users to manage funds seamlessly across both financial systems. Multi-Currency Support Bybit Pay supports a range of currencies, including BRL and popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Tether (USDT). Blockchain-Backed Security Bybit Pay ensures secure, tamper-proof transactions through blockchain encryption, maintaining user privacy and transparency. Benefits for Merchants Merchants gain the ability to accept payments from Bybit’s global user base of over 60 million, broadening their customer reach and providing an integrated fiat-crypto payment experience. Welcome Promotion: Cashback Opportunity for Brazilian Users To celebrate the launch, Bybit is offering a promotional campaign that rewards early adopters. • Event Period: January 27 – February 28, 2025 • Eligibility: Users who deposit an equivalent of $100 or more and complete a payment by scanning a PIX QR code. Each week, 100 participants will be randomly selected to receive 100 percent cashback in USDT, capped at the BRL equivalent of 100 USDT per user. Winner Quotas (Weekly): • Payments of $5 – $10: 50 winners • Payments of $11 – $50: 30 winners • Payments of $51 – $100: 20 winners Transforming Digital Payments in Brazil Bybit Pay’s integration with PIX, alongside its multi-currency support and blockchain-powered security, positions the platform as a transformative solution in Brazil’s digital payment landscape. The launch represents a significant step forward in Bybit’s mission to enhance global payment systems and provide secure, flexible solutions for users and merchants. #Bybit / #BybitPay /#TheCryptoArk About Bybit Bybit is the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, serving a global community of over 60 million users. Founded in 2018, Bybit is redefining openness in the decentralized world by creating a simpler, open, and equal ecosystem for everyone. With a strong focus on Web3, Bybit partners strategically with leading blockchain protocols to provide robust infrastructure and drive on-chain innovation. Renowned for its secure custody, diverse marketplaces, intuitive user experience, and advanced blockchain tools, Bybit bridges the gap between TradFi and DeFi, empowering builders, creators, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of Web3. Discover the future of decentralized finance at Bybit.com. For more details about Bybit, please visit Bybit Press For media inquiries, please contact: media@bybit.com For updates, please follow: Bybit's Communities and Social Media ContactHead of PRTony AuBybittony.au@bybit.com Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.
